words.def: any physical damage to the body caused by violence or accident or fracture etc.
a body of citizens sworn to give a true verdict according to the evidence presented in a court of law
an irrecoverable state of devastation and destruction
A monetary unit of North Korea  and formerly of South Korea , equal to one hundredth of a won.
the dark negative feminine principle in Chinese dualistic cosmology
a score in baseball made by a runner touching all four bases safely
a large vase that usually has a pedestal or feet
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
the 13th letter of the Greek alphabet
an organization of independent states formed in 1945 to promote international peace and security
